Text: btw it's the 7x08, good torrent but seed a bit more pls!

Does not work with my iPod Touch 4G. Usually your DW episodes all do but this weeks doesn't work. 

Please can you check the file and/or re-upload it? I like your versions and don't want to re-download everything by someone else so that it all matches.

@krlitatv Thanks! The Christmas episodes in the past didn't get a proper episode number and I'm just continuing the pattern. This is episode number 7, but it's the 8th episode aired.

@penisinsideme Glad you like the other episodes! This one seems to work fine on my iPhone 4. Could you clarify what you mean? Does it not show up in iTunes? Does it refuse to transfer onto the device?

Nevermind, it works. I closed iTunes completely and ejected my iPod Touch and then plugged it back in. Everything worked normally and plays. Sorry about that, it must have been trouble on my end.

File is beautiful as always. Keep up the awesome DW rips!! Thank You!!!
@penisinsideme Great! I'm happy you got it sorted out. Enjoy!
